alert.note: Alert for Craig; Mayes; Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 5:18PM CST until January 02 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN CRAIG...EASTERN ROGERS AND WESTERN MAYES COUNTIES... At 517 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Foyil to 6 miles east of Taiwah to 2 miles northeast of Inola, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Claremore... Vinita... Pryor... Pryor Creek... Chouteau... Chelsea... Inola... Adair... Foyil... Big Cabin... White Oak... Sportsmen Acres Community... Tiawah... Bushyhead... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 249 and 281. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
